title: Walkercito | Welcome!
description: Freelance programmer and 3D artist. Specializing in Python, TypeScript, and automation. Turning creative ideas into reality. EN/ES/IT.
name: Walkercito
about: As a freelance developer, I specialize in delivering innovative solutions using Python and TypeScript. My expertise spans automation, web development, bot creation, and database systems. With a background in 3D animation and modeling for 3D printing, I bring a creative edge to technical projects. Passionate about game development with Godot and robotics with Raspberry Pi, I combine creativity and technology to craft efficient, tailored solutions. Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life!

experience.title: Freelance Programmer
experience.subtitle: Developer
experience.description: Developed sophisticated bots for Discord and Telegram, web applications with Reflex and FastAPI, web scraping projects, and AI-related projects.

experience.title: 3D Animator and Modeler
experience.subtitle: 3D Artist
experience.description: Created 3D models and animations with a focus on 3D printing projects.

projects.title: ArcadiaNET
projects.subtitle: 90s-inspired IRC chatroom
projects.description: A real-time chatroom inspired by classic 90s IRC platforms. Users connect with a username to share text and emojis in a retro experience. Built with Reflex and accessible globally using ngrok.

projects.title: Telegram Mini App
projects.subtitle: Web3 in pure Python
projects.description: Developed a Web3 application; “Llama's Garden” for decentralized gaming with TON in pure Python (Currently off due to maintenance).

projects.title: BlueLights
projects.subtitle: LEDs controller via Bluetooth
projects.description: BlueLights is a Python library designed for controlling MohuanLED Bluetooth lights. With this library, you can turn lights on/off, change colors, and apply various effects such as fading, strobe, and rainbow cycles. It also includes a GUI using PyQt6 for intuitive control of the lights.

projects.title: Adeptus Studio
projects.subtitle: Discord bot
projects.description: An advanced multi-purpose Discord bot with a wide range of features, including moderation, project administration, tickets, payment tracking, status checker, and more. Try it out!

projects.title: Home Automation System
projects.subtitle: Automation system
projects.description: Developed a home automation system based on Raspberry Pi for smart control.

projects.title: CopyClip
projects.subtitle: Windows-like Clipboard Manager for Linux
projects.description: CopyClip is an open-source clipboard manager designed to replicate the advanced clipboard features of Windows 10 on Linux. It allows users to manage clipboard history, pin important items, and customize shortcuts.

training.title: Harvard Online University
training.subtitle: Certification in Data Science and AI
training.description: Certified in AI algorithms and data science.

extras.title: Blog: ArcadiaNET
extras.description: Sharing the development journey, challenges, and reflections on building ArcadiaNET. Blog post coming soon!

extras.title: Python Code Jam
extras.description: Got 3rd Place and demonstrated advanced coding skills in a competitive environment with a Discord bot with the theme 'Information Overload'.

extras.title: 3D Printing Projects
extras.description: Developed various custom 3D printing projects using Blender and advanced modeling techniques.
